title: Ujjivan Small Finance Bank appoints Sriram Srinivasan as head of digital banking - Economic Times
content: Ujjivan Small Finance Bank appoints Sriram Srinivasan as head of digital banking  Economic Times
description: He has a rich experience of over 26 years, having worked extensively in Japan, India, Singapore, Hong Kong, Vietnam and China markets at the global, country, and regional levels, Ujjivan SFB said in a release.
